name: lidify
tagline: A self-hosted recommendation service for generating personalized media suggestions
description: Lidify is a self-hosted LightFM-based recommender service for media or user-content platforms. It helps generate personalized suggestions based on user behavior and historical data within privacy-controlled environments.

features.title: Spotify Playlist Import
features.description: Import playlists from Spotify into local music libraries

features.title: Lidarr Integration
features.description: Send imported playlists to a Lidarr instance

features.title: Playlist Sync
features.description: Keep playlists synchronized with Spotify changes

features.title: Command-Line Interface
features.description: Run playlist imports using CLI commands

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the playlist tool on your own infrastructure
